column4: it seems that ubuntu dosn't support my integrated soundcard.. and the motherboard-manufacturer dosn't have linux-drivers at their page.. what should i do? buy a new soundcard that i KNOW is supported?
no, i don't :( how do i get one?
start with lspci and see what that lists...note the bus id ob:0 or like that sound cards often are 0600 devices..then lspci -n and see what pci id is
